name: Valenth - Visited Links Color
description: This affects only "feeding" links, and changes the color of them on the Valenth website so you/I dont lose track of how many text links iv clicked so far in a thread ^^'
additional_info:
In order to clear the color change for the next days feeding reset, you must delete your browser history of the links.

NOTE:
--Make sure on the "edit" page of this style, it says something like:
           " URLS on Domain: valenth.com "
